MERS.QA.long_name: Al Meera Consumer Goods Company Q.P.S.C.
MERS.QA.summary: Al Meera Consumer Goods Company Q.P.S.C., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail trade of consumer goods commodities in Qatar and the Sultanate of Oman. It operates through three segments: Retail, Investment, and Leasing. The company sells foodstuff, household items and garments, stationery, computer accessories, books, and toys; owns and manages consumer outlets; holds equity and funds in the form of investment securities and fixed deposits; and rents shops in various malls. It also establishes and operates shopping centers, supermarkets, and hypermarkets; manufactures and sells bakery products; and offers warehousing and delivery truck services. The company operates through 60 supermarkets and convenience stores. Al Meera Consumer Goods Company Q.P.S.C. was founded in 2005 and is based in Doha, Qatar.
